description: The scholarship is for UCO Students pursing a Forensic Science degree. Eligibility Requirements New student admitted to the MS in Forensic Science Program with a minimum undergraduate GPA of 3.25 Current MS in Forensic Science student with minimum 3.5 GPA This scholarship is available to apply for during the Current UCO Student Application.

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
